value:
Life would sure be easier if we all
knew where each other stood... That
goes for friends too, not just foes...$k$p...Huh? Oh, don't mind me. Just
talking to myself.

Oh, Matthew... You said you wanted
me to meet your family, right? What
else can that mean to a lady besides...

How many times do you think I could
cut you before you noticed? ...Heh.$k$pOh, don't worry! It just looked like
you were off in your own little world,
so I thought I'd have a little fun.

Hm? Oh, I'm just familiarizing myself
with my surroundings. It's something
I always do...in case I need to escape.

I never give less than my all. That
may sound extreme, but it pays off
when it's a matter of life and death.

I come bearing greetings from your
friend $Nf.

If one of the Four Fangs came at me
now, I'd give them a good run for
their money...
As you say.
Just have to grin and bear it...

I take it you have something in mind
for me, and that's why you're giving
this to me... Well, I won't say no.

...And who might you be? ...Huh? Me?
Well, if you must know, I'm Leila. I'd
steer clear of me if I were you...$k$pTrust me. It's for your own good.

You're pretty amazing, you know
that? To have gathered so many
Heroes under one banner...$k$pAnd beyond even that, your potential
may rival even that of Lord Hector!$k$pYes, I said "Lord" Hector... I already
know there's no point in hiding the
fact I'm an Ostian spy from you.$k$pAs a spy, I infiltrate organizations, lurk
in their darkest corners, listening and
leaking information to the outside.$k$pOh, but don't worry. I'm not here on
orders. No, no...I'm just here because,
well...you summoned me, of course.$k$pI suppose that means I take orders
from you, then! Danger's nothing
new to me, so I'll take any mission!
せいっ
それっ！
うっ…
しくじったわ…
I'll keep looking.
You're a slippery one!
No escape!
For my lord!
Matthew...
ふふ…
I am Leila. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
Who goes there?! ...Oh, it's just you. You're bad for my heart, you know that?
I'm a spy. Everything I do is dangerous. Risking my life is just part of the job.
Matthew wanted me to visit his hometown, but wouldn't say why. He's as slippery as ever...
It seems that Lord Uther has his hands full with his brother, the young Lord Hector. He's quite a character.
Matthew... After this mission, we're going to put this life behind us...
If you ask me, then yes... I will take on even the most dangerous mission.
Smart move.
Right...
As you say.
